issue.title: [Python][Dataset] Dictionary encode string partition columns by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9493](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9493). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-9139 switched the default of use_legacy_dataset from True to False, but left dictionary encoding of string partition columns off by default.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9493?focusedCommentId=17158677) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7777
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7777>
